name: opendap
description: The purpose of this Git repository is to capture the current known working OPeNDAP processing

scripts.push-docker: npm run create-ecr; npm run login-ecr; docker push ${AWS_ACCOUNT_ID}.dkr.ecr.${AWS_REGION}.amazonaws.com/$ECR_NAME
scripts.build-push-docker: export ECR_NAME=opendap && npm run build-docker && npm run push-docker

author: Abdelhak Marouane
